verses.verse: Except the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, they <S%H5998>labor<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> that <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>: except the Lord <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, the <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H8245>wakes<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.

It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> for you to rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%>, to sit <S%H3427>up<s%> <S%H309>late<s%>, to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6089>sorrows<s%>: for so he <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H3039>beloved<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>.
<S%H1121>Behold<s%>, sons are a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%> is his <S%H7939>reward<s%>.
As <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%>; so are <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that has his <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H954>them<s%>: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with the <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
